personalInfo.name: Purvi Sutariya
personalInfo.title: Tech Maestro | Full Stack Developer & Tech Lead
personalInfo.description: With over 6 years of experience in coding and end-to-end product management, I drive strategic growth and quality-driven solutions.

description: I am a passionate Full Stack Developer and Tech Lead with expertise in designing and managing scalable web applications, SaaS platforms, and high-performance backend systems.
I have successfully driven product growth, optimized performance, and led teams in creating impactful solutions.
I have worked extensively on crypto trading platforms, SaaS applications, AI-integrated tools, and large-scale enterprise systems.

qualities.title: Ownership
qualities.description: Taking full responsibility for outcomes and delivery

projects.title: ExtendedForms.io
projects.shortDescription: Advanced form analytics and SaaS product extending Google Forms.
projects.fullDescription: Led the development and growth of ExtendedForms.io, handling development, server-side releases, bug fixes, SEO, and strategic marketing. The platform integrates seamlessly with Google Forms, offering analytics, time tracking, and response management.

projects.title: TaskFlow - Streamlined Project Management Dashboard
projects.shortDescription: A powerful project management dashboard for seamless team collaboration.
projects.fullDescription: TaskFlow is a cutting-edge project management dashboard designed to streamline workflows, enhance collaboration, and provide deep insights through advanced analytics. With role-based access, automation tools, and enterprise-grade security, it caters to businesses of all sizes.
features: Role-based dashboard for administrators, team members, and customers
Enterprise-grade security with role-based access control
Real-time team collaboration with shared workspaces
Task and project tracking with time management features

projects.title: BPS Trading Platform
projects.shortDescription: Crypto trading made easy with real-time data and Binance integration.
projects.fullDescription: Developed a full-fledged crypto trading platform utilizing Binance Link APIs. Implemented real-time order book updates, market tickers, and high-frequency trading capabilities using WebSockets and Redis caching.

projects.title: Hey Buddy - Pet Tags
projects.shortDescription: AI-powered health and location alerts for pet owners.
projects.fullDescription: Created the frontend for Hey Buddy, an AI-driven pet tracking system that notifies owners about health updates and location changes. Integrated deep linking for seamless mobile experience.

projects.title: CompassRT - Trading Widgets
projects.shortDescription: End-to-end trading widget development with real-time data streams.
projects.fullDescription: Developed a highly optimized trading widget platform integrating Finhubb API, TradingView charts, and real-time data updates via WebSockets.

projects.title: GitHub Copilot Contributions
projects.shortDescription: Reviewed AI-generated code and improved suggestions.
projects.fullDescription: Worked with GitHub Copilot to review AI-generated code snippets, enhance quality, and optimize the generated code blocks for better performance and reliability.

projects.title: ZWOPR Admin Solution
projects.shortDescription: A social impact platform with AI-powered content generation.
projects.fullDescription: Developed an end-to-end admin solution for Zwopr, a platform promoting environmentally friendly social initiatives. Integrated multi-language support, user role management, and AI-powered content generation using Neuroflash APIs.
features: Admin panel with user role management

projects.title: Rightful - Australia's Leading Legal Network
projects.shortDescription: Legal tech platform for Australian lawyers and clients.
projects.fullDescription: As part of the frontend team, designed and developed a pixel-perfect UI for Rightful, ensuring smooth animations, timed effects, and GIF support for an engaging user experience.

projects.title: eBaggage Drop
projects.shortDescription: AI-powered baggage measurement system for airports.
projects.fullDescription: Developed a React-based baggage measurement system that uses AI to verify and calculate baggage weight, size, and count. Integrated a kiosk server and socket.io for real-time updates.
features: Automatic baggage weight and size verification

projects.title: Kexy Restaurants - RMS
projects.shortDescription: Restaurant Management System with Ad and Payment Integrations.
projects.fullDescription: Worked as a backend developer for Kexy RMS, integrating Ad Butler for advertisers and Stripe Connect for seamless financial transactions. Optimized MySQL databases for efficient data handling.

projects.title: LRTS - Gift Delivery App
projects.shortDescription: E-commerce platform for anonymous gift delivery.
projects.fullDescription: Developed the backend for LRTS, enabling users to send gifts anonymously through a secure and automated delivery system.
